name: Breeze
body:
### Breeze CMS developer page.
Welcome to Breeze CMS developer page, this tool is brought to you by LeftClick. 

### Contribution
To contribute just fork the repository and create a new branch
```
$ cd your_repo_root/breeze
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout -b my-new-feature
```

make sure the tests are still passing 
```
bundle exec rake spec
```

then submit your pull request. 

### License

### Authors and Contributors
@leftclick invested and developed this platform. 
Contributors:
* @fauxparse
* @bneate
* @isaacfreeman
* @albandiguer

### Bug & Issues
If you encounter any issue with the software, feel free to use the issue tracking tool provided by Github.
